overview:
I’m a seventeen year marketing veteran with over a decade of interactive experience in web development and online marketing. I’m a freelance website designer, web developer and online marketer.

Coding in PHP, HTML, Flash, WordPress, e-commerce, Joomla & Drupal. Online Marketing includes SEO, SEM, PPC, Social media and advertising.
